definition: Myanmar (formerly Burma) (abbr. for 緬甸|缅甸[Mian3 dian4])
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to commemorate/to recall fondly/to think of the past
(bird species of China) Indian spot-billed duck (Anas poecilorhyncha)
(bird species of China) manipur fulvetta (Fulvetta manipurensis)
pinyin: yin4 mian3 he4 tou2 que4 mei2

definition: Union of Myanmar, official name of Burma 1998-2010

sentences.english: Of the tribe of Simeon, Shaphat the son of Hori.
sentences.chinese: 屬西緬支派的有何利的兒子的沙法。

sentences.english: Today, many Burmese view China as a pillager of resources.
sentences.chinese: 如今，許多緬族人都把中國看做是一個資源掠奪者。

sentences.english: And feel that my mother now thinks of her child.
sentences.chinese: 便想起母親正緬想着她的孩子。

sentences.english: A unit of the SSA North's First Brigade attacked without provocation.
sentences.chinese: 北撣邦軍第一旅的單位遭緬軍突然襲擊。

sentences.english: Shemuel son of Ammihud, from the tribe of Simeon;
sentences.chinese: 西緬支派有亞米忽的兒子示母利。

sentences.english: Yearning for a long enrapture you yesterday and the longing for a beautiful future.
sentences.chinese: 思念是對你昨日悠長的沉緬和對未來美好的嚮往。

sentences.english: Hu Jintao said that the people of China and Myanmar have enjoyed long-standing friendship.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤說，中緬兩國人民的友誼源遠流長。

sentences.english: Of the tribe of Simeon， Shaphat the son of Hori.
sentences.chinese: 屬西緬支派的有何利的兒子的沙法。

sentences.english: After what happened, China and Myanmar have kept close communication.
sentences.chinese: 事態發生以後，中緬雙方保持着密切溝通。

sentences.english: Against this backdrop, it is highly necessary to enhance exchanges between leaders of the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 在這一背影下，加強中緬領導人的相互交往十分必要。

sentences.english: The second lot came out for the tribe of Simeon, clan by clan.
sentences.chinese: 爲西緬支派的人，按着宗族，拈出第二鬮。

sentences.english: She will travel to the Thai-Burmese border to visit a refugee center, and a clinic.
sentences.chinese: 她將前往泰緬邊界，參觀一個難民營和一個診所。

sentences.english: Of Simeon; Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
sentences.chinese: 西緬的，有蘇利沙代的兒子示路蔑。

sentences.english: The source said that the intention is to put all militia members under Burmese military command.
sentences.chinese: 此一舉動目的是把民兵組織置於緬軍統一指揮下。

sentences.english: And by the border of Benjamin, from the east side unto the west side, Simeon shall have a portion.
sentences.chinese: 挨着便雅憫的地界，從東到西，是西緬的一分。

sentences.english: Following which tension is palpable between the Burmese Army and KPC.
sentences.chinese: 隨即緬軍和和平委員會部隊之間已經進入緊張局勢。

definition: to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
short name for Fujian province 福建[Fu2 jian4]/also pr. [Min2]
abbr. for Syria 敘利亞|叙利亚[Xu4 li4 ya4]
Chinese Nationalist Party 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3] and Chinese Communist Party 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3]
to run fast/to speed/to gallop/to disseminate/to spread
to annihilate/abbr. for 殲擊機|歼击机, fighter plane
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
